data.title: Purolator Quick Stop Kiosks
data.meta_description: We have teamed up with Purolator to offer you a convenient option to pick up or drop off your packages!
data.text:
We have teamed up with Purolator to offer you a convenient option to pick up or drop off your Purolator packages at a Purolator parcel locker, or drop off your packages at a self-serve Quick Stop kiosk at select GO stations.

Best of all, you’ll never need to worry about unattended packages at home if you have missed a home delivery or have selected to have your package delivered to a parcel locker.

Quick Stop Kiosks and Parcel Lockers

Stations:

Quick Stop Kiosks: Union Station Bus Terminal and Durham College Oshawa GO Station inside the station buildings

Parcel Lockers: Bramalea, Scarborough, Pickering, and Cooksville GO stations

Hours of Operation for the kiosk:

Union Station Bus Terminal: Monday to Friday from 5:00 am to 2:50 am. Saturday, Sunday, and Holidays from 5:00 am to 2:50 am.

Durham College Oshawa GO station building: Monday to Friday from 5:30 am to 11:15 pm. Saturday, Sunday, and Holidays from 6:00 am to 11:15 pm.

Service Offerings and Payment at the kiosk:

Package drop off: You can ship a package at the kiosk by creating a shipping label, placing your package into the unit, and printing a receipt for tracking. If you have an account with Purolator, you can also ship a package with a pre-paid shipping label that you have printed at home.

Payment: Customers can pay with credit, debit, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

Hours of Operation for the parcel locker:

Monday to Sunday, 24 hours a day (including holidays)

Service Offerings at the parcel locker:

Package drop off: If you have an account with Purolator, you can ship a package at the locker with a pre-paid shipping label that you have printed at home.

Package pick up: If you have missed a home delivery or have selected Bramalea GO as your pickup location, you can securely pick up your package using the parcel locker. Once the courier delivers your package, you will receive an SMS notification with shipment pick up details and an access code/QR code. You simply scan or enter the code provided and retrieve your package.

Holiday Savings with Purolator

Save 40% off on domestic shipments or 50% off on U.S. and international shipments with Purolator from now until January 31, 2024. Visit Purolator’s website for more information.

Purolator's Sustainable Initiative

Purolator is thrilled to officially open their third Urban Quick Stop, and the first of its kind in the City of Mississauga. Located at Cooksville GO is a 20-foot shipping container that holds parcels and uses electric bikes to deliver to the surrounding communities, as a more sustainable way to ship. By using e-bikes to deliver, Purolator will decrease traffic congestion and reduce emissions by 27 tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent per year.
